PerfectNetExp.abs: 月份与星期的英文_百度文库 ... boar 种猪 hog 阉猪, 肥猪 gilt 小母猪.
话题词汇- 沪江碎碎图文集 ... swine n. 猪，贪心下流的家伙； hog n. 肉猪，贪婪的人； pork n. 猪肉；.
在英语中boar一词指未阉割的公猪和公野猪，涉及猪的词语有pig（猪、小猪、野猪），hog（食用猪）、sow（牝猪），swine（猪：旧用法）。十二生肖用boar，比喻贪婪
a scandal overhog 猪，贪婪者，拱起heaven

phrase.cizu_name: live high on (或 off) the hog

jx.jx_en_mean: (N. Amer. informal)(北美，非正式)have a luxurious lifestyle
In a lavish or extravagant manner

lj.lj_ly: lives high on the hog since getting his share of the inheritance.
lj.lj_ls: 他自从继承遗产后过得很奢侈

phrase.cizu_name: high on the hog 或 high off the hog &I{【俚语】}

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English hogg, hocg, perhaps of Celtic origin and related to Welsh hwch and Cornish hoch 'pig, sow'

entry.tran: 猪（英国英语中常指阉公猪，而美国英语中泛指猪）
entry.def: A hog is a pig. In British English, hog usually refers to a large male pig that has been castrated, but in American English it can refer to any kind of pig.

example.ex: We picked the corn by hand and we fed it to the hogs and the cows...
example.tran: 我们用手掰下玉米，把它喂给猪和牛吃。

example.ex: Johnny Warrick has a hog farm in Alabama.
example.tran: 约翰尼·沃里克在亚拉巴马州有个养猪场。

entry.def: If you hog something, you take all of it in a greedy or impolite way.

example.ex: Have you done hogging the bathroom?...
example.tran: 你要把浴室霸占到什么时候？

example.ex: Now, Bert, quit hogging the limelight.

entry.tran: 彻底地干;一不做二不休
entry.def: If you go the whole hog, you do something bold or extravagant in the most complete way possible.

example.ex: Well, I thought, I've already lost half my job, I might as well go the whole hog and lose it completely.
example.tran: 嗯，我想，反正我的工作已经丢了一半了，干脆一不做二不休，走人算了。

means.word_mean: 1. a person regarded as greedy and pig-like
2. a sheep up to the age of one year; one yet to be sheared
1. take greedily; take more than one's share

list.explanation: (军队用语)(尤指便携式的) 扬声器

sentences.en: He is greedy like a hog.

means.word_mean: 彻底地做某事；干到底；尽力而为

sentences.en: They painted the kitchen and then decided to go the whole hog and do the other rooms as well.
sentences.cn: 他们粉刷了厨房，然后决定一鼓作气，把其他房间也刷了。
